Package datastructure

This package contains the classes that define the model of the library.

See: Description

  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    Action
    This abstract class allows the user to easily add new types of actions (basic types being Draw, Fill, Insert and Labelise).
    Drawing
    This abstract class is the base of all the model structure.
    Operator
    This abstract class allows the user to easily add new operations (basic types being Sequence, Alternative, Loop).
    Path
    This class allows the user to easily add new paths (basic types being PolygonalPath and BezierCurve) If the user wants to add a new "export" mode (basic export modes are to SVG and to Java), they need to declare a new abstract method: public abstract void generateNewExportModePath(); The generateNewExportModePath method will have to be implemented for all paths.
    Tool
    This class allows the user to easily add new tools.

Package datastructure Description

This package contains the classes that define the model of the library.
